rev.desc.rev.desc: AGMRQ10H17568, update start panel, add
$L.primary=jscall("Workflow.getWorkflowTableName", $L.primary)
AGMRQ10H14784, add new parameter $INTO.APPEND.QUERY
QCRQ1E99642 As an agreement operator, I can associate others with agreement
In Panel: build.query
Add Append Query to the query
add panel "link.rootcause" whose type is "us.save.relation"
set exit:normal of panel "check.save" as "link.rootcause"
delete unused panel: already.message,message,save
QC32246 - Modified the following panels:
* check.dest.unique - changed condition exit from 'build.query' to 'set.dest.unique'
* set.dest.unique - new process panel that exits to 'build.query' and executes: if (not null($L.unique.dest)) then ($L.association=$L.unique.dest)
* build.query - removed expression: if (not null($L.unique.dest)) then ($L.association=$L.unique.dest)
This way, the query won't keep getting reset to include an incoming destination ID that is invalid to begin with.
added aupport for prompt relate/unrelate records
Replaced a mb.ok panel with apm.mb.ok to clear some corruption problems.
Modified so that a record can not be related to itself.
recompiled after fixing database errors.
Fixed to init probsummary instead of problem.
Removed following line from build.query:
if ($L.dest="cm3r") then (1 in $L.association.array=val(1 in $L.association.array, 1))
Started a change that will allow searching when associating a record to another.
Externalized association message by calling us.notify instead of message.
Added a condition for cm3r in panel build.query to take care of the numeric value for a Change number:
if ($L.dest="cm3r") then (1 in $L.association.array=val(1 in $L.association.array, 1))
Modified to work with new screlconfig for problem.
Set up for generic processing.
scmsg
New application to call to associate two records. (incidents, problem, cm3r, or ocmq only)

set exit:normal of panel "check.save" as "link.rootcause"
delete unused panel: already.message,message,save
QC32246 - Modified the following panels:
* check.dest.unique - changed condition exit from 'build.query' to 'set.dest.unique'
* set.dest.unique - new process panel that exits to 'build.query' and executes: if (not null($L.unique.dest)) then ($L.association=$L.unique.dest)
* build.query - removed expression: if (not null($L.unique.dest)) then ($L.association=$L.unique.dest)
This way, the query won't keep getting reset to include an incoming destination ID that is invalid to begin with.
added aupport for prompt relate/unrelate records
Replaced a mb.ok panel with apm.mb.ok to clear some corruption problems.
Modified so that a record can not be related to itself.
recompiled after fixing database errors.
Fixed to init probsummary instead of problem.
Removed following line from build.query:
if ($L.dest="cm3r") then (1 in $L.association.array=val(1 in $L.association.array, 1))
Started a change that will allow searching when associating a record to another.
Externalized association message by calling us.notify instead of message.
Added a condition for cm3r in panel build.query to take care of the numeric value for a Change number:
if ($L.dest="cm3r") then (1 in $L.association.array=val(1 in $L.association.array, 1))
Modified to work with new screlconfig for problem.
Set up for generic processing.
scmsg
New application to call to associate two records. (incidents, problem, cm3r, or ocmq only)
